results.title: Simvastatin Improves Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia: Role of Peroxisome-Proliferator-Activated Receptor-gamma and Classic WNT/beta-Catenin Pathway
results.text_hl: However, the specific mechanism of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SV@@@ in the development of @<m>DISEASE_Prostatic_Hyperplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011470 @@@BPH@@@ is still unclear.

results.title: Simvastatin ameliorates testosterone-induced prostatic hyperplasia in rats via modulating IGF-1/PI3K/AKT/FOXO signaling.
results.text_hl: This study aims to determine @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@'s beneficial effect on @CHEMICAL_Testosterone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013739 @@@testosterone@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Prostatic_Hyperplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011470 @@@BPH@@@.

results.title: [Pharmacologic treatment of benign prostatic hypertrophy (BPH): a combination of mepartricin and simvastatin. Analysis and results].

results.title: Influence and pathophysiological mechanisms of simvastatin on prostatic hyperplasia in spontaneously hypertensive rats.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ can delay and inhibit @<m>DISEASE_Prostatic_Hyperplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011470 @@@prostatic hyperplasia@@@ and progression in SHR.

results.title: The effects of statins on benign prostatic hyperplasia in elderly patients with metabolic syndrome.
results.text_hl: PURPOSE: To evaluate the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ in elderly male @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Prostatic_Hyperplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011470 @@@benign prostatic hyperplasia@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Prostatic_Hyperplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011470 @@@BPH@@@) accompanied by @DISEASE_Metabolic_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D024821 @@@metabolic syndrome@@@ (@DISEASE_Metabolic_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D024821 @@@MetS@@@).

results.title: Acute hepatitis associated with the use of levofloxacin.
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ had a history of @DISEASE_Bronchitis_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D029481 @@@chronic bronchitis@@@, arterial @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@, @DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Prostatic_Hyperplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011470 @@@benign prostatic hyperplasia@@@, and was being treated with @CHEMICAL_Salmeterol_Xinafoate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068299 @@@salmeterol@@@ 50 mug plus @CHEMICAL_Fluticasone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068298 @@@fluticasone@@@ 250 mug BID, and @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ 5 mg, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 20 mg, @CHEMICAL_alfuzosin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C047638 @@@alfuzosin@@@ 10 mg, and @CHEMICAL_Finasteride @CHEMICAL_MESH:D018120 @@@finasteride@@@ 5 mg once daily.

citations.NLM: Figueira-Coelho J, Pereira O, Picado B, Mendonça P, Neves-Costa J, Neta J. Acute hepatitis associated with the use of levofloxacin. Clin Ther. 2010 Sep;32(10):1733-7. PMID: 21194596
